QuestData.Title: Cat on a Hot Copper Roof
QuestData.Description: My parents said we have to go, but I won't leave Scratchy behind!$B$BShe's so gentle and precious and pure and kind and soft and cuddly! She must be so scared up there on the balcony!$B$BPlease help her!
QuestData.LogDescription: Climb the burning house and rescue Scratchy.
QuestData.RewardText: Yay!$B$BIsn't she the sweetest most perfectest kitty cat ever?!
